ghostPost.title: Online meeting na téma Situace v Evropě po Covid-19
ghostPost.excerpt:
Dne 23. 6. 2020 18–20 hod. se uskutečnil první online meeting na téma Situace v
Evropě po Covid-19 organizovaný Evropskou asociací TV (EUPEA). Jednací jazyk
angličtina - zájemci o shlédnutí navštivte tuto webovou stránku
[https://www.facebook.com/watch/live/?v=550352068995155&ref=watch_permalink].

> The situation in Europe after COVID-19
[https://developers.facebook.com/eupea1/videos/550352068995155/]The Covid-19
pandemic has radically changed the way education systems operate in Europe. Many
European countries have not considered physical education as a priority. The
European Physical Education Association, which brings together all physical
education associations in Europe, is organizing the first European online
physical education evening.
During this event, different physical education teachers from all over Europe
will present the situation of physical education.

Eupea will present the position stament on physical education.

Zveřejnil(a) EUPEA European Physical Education Association

ghostPost.html:
Dne 23. 6. 2020 18–20 hod. se uskutečnil první online meeting na téma Situace v Evropě po Covid-19 organizovaný Evropskou asociací TV (EUPEA). Jednací jazyk angličtina - zájemci o shlédnutí navštivte tuto webovou stránku.

The situation in Europe after COVID-19

The Covid-19 pandemic has radically changed the way education systems operate in Europe. Many European countries have not considered physical education as a priority. The European Physical Education Association, which brings together all physical education associations in Europe, is organizing the first European online physical education evening. During this event, different physical education teachers from all over Europe will present the situation of physical education. Eupea will present the position stament on physical education.

Zveřejnil(a) EUPEA European Physical Education Association dne Úterý 23. června 2020
